summary: The Financial Audit Manual (FAM) presents a methodology for performing financial statement audits of federal entities in accordance with professional standards. It is a tool for enhancing accountability over taxpayer-provided resources. This May 2023 update replaces Financial Audit Manual, Volume 2 (June 2022 version) and contains detailed implementation guidance. The FAM also consists of: Volume 1 : the audit methodology Volume 3 : the Federal...
title: Financial Audit Manual: Volume 2, June 2022 (Updated May 2023)
